name: TURBO PIZZA STICK
description:
You only need A and D to complete the game!

Enjoy the simple and compact controls. Fear the difficulty of later levels. Always obtain the pizza stick. Enjoy the beat. Watch out for the giant blue bugs. That should be all!

Experience Includes:

-Turbo boosted movement

-12 Tricky levels

-Slapping sound track

-OBTAINABLE PIZZA STICKS!

Made in two days for Mini Jam 66: Sweets

Developed by BudgetHiko
